partners.title: Become a partner
partners.text: Are you looking for a reliable partner in paint sales?

hero_section.title: LLP "K-COLOR" "K-COLOR" with the trademark "REMALUX" - high European quality at an affordable price.
hero_section.description: LLP "K-COLOR" "K-COLOR" with the trademark "REMALUX" is a leader in the production of paints and varnishes, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan.

why_choose_us.title: Why do buyers choose our products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted for their high quality, innovative solutions and economical consumption.

quality.title: High quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control to ensure superior coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative production technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technology to create paints that apply easily, dry quickly and deliver rich colors.

economy.title: Economical consumption of materials
economy.description: Our paints provide high hiding power, which allows you to reduce consumption and reduce costs.

price.title: Competitive prices
price.description: We offer excellent value for money so you can get a professional product at an affordable price.

assortment.title: Wide range of products
assortment.description: In our assortment you will find paints for any need - from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who are our company's products intended for?
for_whom.description: The products we produce are designed to easily satisfy the requirements of the most stringent highly qualified professionals for use in prestigious, executive-level facilities.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything you need for perfect results
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paints and varnishes with modern technology and excellent service.

innovation.title: Innovative technologies and modern production methods
innovation.description: The production of paints and varnishes at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and achievements of chemical science, which guarantees high quality and safety of products at competitive prices.

service.title: Service
service.description: We provide pre-purchase and post-purchase services to meet customer requirements through high quality products and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide range of products
assortment.description: REMALUX offers texture coatings, water-based paints, varnishes, acrylic adhesives and other materials.

safety.title: Safety and comfort in use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, which ensures comfortable use for both professionals and home craftsmen.

our_fleet.title: Our fleet: Fast and reliable delivery
our_fleet.description: The products we produce are designed to easily satisfy the requirements of the most stringent highly qualified professionals for use in prestigious, executive-level facilities.
